statement.title: Content
statement.content: In this problem,you will be give three positive integers,and you are to calculate $a^{b^c}\ mod\ 1000000007$.

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content: Each line of input will contain three positive integers:$a,b,c\leq 1000000000$.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: For each case, print a number index the answer.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
2 2 216
2 3 2512
